item.description:
Dr Max has graciously offered to lead the group in an exploratory walk in search of medicinal mushrooms at Robinson Woods in Cape Elizabeth (parking and entry kiosk located on Shore Road. See the Land Trust map to locate Robinson Woods more accurately: http://www.capelandtr...)

This event is limited to 15 people, but we hope to do another walk for edible mushrooms in September (more details coming later on that one). We may also be doing other mushroom-related walks further north later this year.

Please dress in layers for the weather and bring sunscreen/bug repellent/drinking water as needed.

If you would like to attend but the meeting is full, pls RSVP "no" with a comment indicating you'd like to be on the waiting list.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Medicinal Mushroom Walk w/ Dr Max Jacobs
